data.quote: We read to know that we are not alone.
data.author: C. S. Lewis

data.quote: You are BRAVER than you believe, and STRONGER tha you seem, and SMARTER than you think.
data.author: Christopher Robin

data.quote: Be yourself, everyone else is already taken.
data.author: Oscar Wilde

data.quote: Life is not about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
data.author: Lolly Daskal

data.quote: It's hard to beat a person who never gives up.
data.author: Babe Ruth

data.quote: A man should keep his little brain attic stocked with all the furniture that he is likely to use, and the rest he can put away in the lumber-room of his library, where he can get it if he wants it.
data.author: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

data.quote: It is a great thing to start life with a small number of really good books which are your very own.
data.author: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

data.quote: Mediocrity knows nothing higher than itself, but talent instantly recognizes genius.
data.author: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

data.quote: You see, but you do not observe.
data.author: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

data.quote: If you quit once, it becomes a Habit. NEVER QUIT.
data.author: Michael Jordan
